titleNullable: Russia Ukraine Conflict News Reporting Dataset
subtitleNullable: Scraped articles for multiple news outlets based on timeline of events
descriptionNullable:
# Ukraine Russia Conflict Media Reporting


__Reference__ : A timeline event
- eg. Bombing in X city 
- all columns prefixed `ref_` are part of the reference 

__Article__ : Articles scraped based on reference 
- eg. NYT article based on reference 
- all columns prefixed `art_` are part of the article 



> Data is scraped using __Newspaper3k__ and __selenium__ so article text might need cleaning 

|  Column Name|  Column Description|
| --- | --- |
| `art_article_author`  | Author of the article |
| `art_article_date` | Date of article publishing |
| `art_article_text` |Article Text |
| `art_article_url `| URL for the article |
| `ref_full-text`| Reference used for google search query to get the article |
|`ref_time-capture` | Timestamp for reference|
| `ref_source`|Source of reference  |
| `ref_title`|Title of reference |
